mapper.select: select count(seq) from send_note where seq > 0
mapper.insert: insert into send_note (seq, recv_id, send_id, content, name, send_date) values ((select nvl(max(seq)+1,0) from send_note), #{recv_id}, #{send_id}, #{content}, #{name}, to_char(sysdate,'yy.mm.dd hh24:mi'))

insert into recv_note (seq, recv_id, send_id, content, name, send_date) values ((select nvl(max(seq)+1,0) from recv_note), #{recv_id}, #{send_id}, #{content}, #{name}, to_char(sysdate,'yy.mm.dd hh24:mi'))
